input: text: Comedy can bring joy and laughter. It helps people relax and forget worries. Stand-up comedians are skilled in delivering humor.
coverage:
```html Formatted Paragraph

Comedy can bring joy and laughter. It has the power to uplift moods and create a sense of happiness.

It helps people relax and forget their worries. Through humor, individuals can escape reality and enjoy a moment of freedom.

Stand-up comedians are skilled in delivering humor. Their ability to engage audiences is remarkable and provides an enriching experience.

```
validityText:
The provided input is a paragraph of text consisting of three separate sentences: "Comedy can bring joy and laughter." "It helps people relax and forget worries." "Stand-up comedians are skilled in delivering humor." The paragraph has the required minimum of three sentences, fulfilling the length requirement of the specification.

The input specification mentions that words or phrases can be emphasized using <strong> and <em> tags, but it does not mandate that these tags must be used in the input. Their usage is optional, which means the absence of such tags does not constitute a violation of the specification.

Therefore, the paragraph complies with all aspects of the provided input specification.

OK
